description: Optimizes a prompt for the task that you specify. For more information, see Optimize a prompt in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Contains the prompt to optimize. textPrompt (dict) --- Contains information about the text prompt to optimize. The text in the text prompt to optimize.

nested_params.name: textPrompt
nested_params.description: Contains information about the text prompt to optimize.

nested_params.name: text
nested_params.description: The text in the text prompt to optimize.

parameters.name: targetModelId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the model that you want to optimize the prompt for.

nested_items.name: optimizedPrompt
nested_items.description: The prompt after being optimized for the task.

nested_items.name: accessDeniedException
nested_items.description: The request is denied because of missing access permissions. Check your permissions and retry your request.

nested_items.name: analyzePromptEvent
nested_items.description: An event in which the prompt was analyzed in preparation for optimization.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message describing the analysis of the prompt.

nested_items.name: badGatewayException
nested_items.description: There was an issue with a dependency due to a server issue. Retry your request.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the dependency that caused the issue, such as Amazon Bedrock, Lambda, or STS.

nested_items.name: dependencyFailedException
nested_items.description: There was an issue with a dependency. Check the resource configurations and retry the request.

nested_items.name: resourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the dependency that caused the issue, such as Amazon Bedrock, Lambda, or STS.

nested_items.name: internalServerException
nested_items.description: An internal server error occurred. Retry your request.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: The reason for the exception. If the reason is BEDROCK_MODEL_INVOCATION_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE, the model invocation service is unavailable. Retry your request.

nested_items.name: optimizedPromptEvent
nested_items.description: An event in which the prompt was optimized.

nested_items.name: optimizedPrompt
nested_items.description: Contains information about the optimized prompt.

nested_items.name: textPrompt
nested_items.description: Contains information about the text in the prompt that was optimized.

nested_items.name: text
nested_items.description: The text in the text prompt to optimize.

nested_items.name: throttlingException
nested_items.description: Your request was throttled because of service-wide limitations. Resubmit your request later or in a different region. You can also purchase Provisioned Throughput to increase the rate or number of tokens you can process.

nested_items.name: validationException
nested_items.description: Input validation failed. Check your request parameters and retry the request.
